title: A paddy field views an antique house for sale
details:
This house was almost 80 years old.
Well maintain house
Court yard but they built a roof
Soldaraya
Downstairs wood ceilings
Cement floor
Tap and well water
3 phase electricity
Well maintained garden
Behind the house one acre rubber estate
It's faced to a massive paddy field
3.5 km to Ahangama town and beach
8.0km to southern highway entrance at Imaduwa
House inspection only prior appointment with our real estate agent.
